results.notes: eTA required if arriving by air.Spanish citizens aged 18 - 35 can apply for a resident permit on the basis of a working holiday. Must have CAN$2,500 and medical insurance

Spanish citizens can apply for a resident permit on the basis of a remote worker in Mexico. For up to 3 years. Must be working remotely for a company outside of Mexico. Earn a minimum of EUR 1,742.54 a month or a bank statement proving funds of EUR 29,042.47. Health insurance with Mexico coverage validity
N/A
Spanish citizens are allowed to enter Turkey with their expired passports (5 years).

eTA fee is 34.09 USD. Applications can be submitted up to 90 days prior to travel and must be submitted at least 3 days in advance. Proof of reservation at the hotel where you plan to stay is required (if staying with friends, an invitation letter is also acceptable). Yellow fever vaccination certificate is required if coming from endemic countries.
90 days within any 180 day period in the Schengen Area with ETAIS
Actual permitted duration of stay is decided on arrival by border agents, and is often shorter than 180 days.
The Canadian government advises its citizens not to visit Syria due to the ongoing armed conflict, terrorism, criminality, arbitrary detention, torture and forced disappearance
Passport must be valid for at least 6 months from date of entry. Cruise ship passengers cruising in and out of a Turkish port within a single day do not require a tourist visa.

eTA fee is 34.09 USD. Applications can be submitted up to 90 days prior to travel and must be submitted at least 3 days in advance. Proof of reservation at the hotel where you plan to stay is required (if staying with friends, an invitation letter is also acceptable). Yellow fever vaccination certificate is required if coming from endemic countries. Can also be entered on an East Africa tourist visa issued by Rwanda or Uganda.
90 days within any 180 day period in the Schengen Area.
Fee of 7 CAD. eTA required if arriving by air.  Canada routinely  denies entry to non-citizens who have a criminal record.
Visa or entry may be refused if the passport contains an Israeli stamp
Issued free of charge. Passport must be valid for 6 months beyond arrival date.

Holders of Turkish ordinary passports who hold a valid visa for a Member State of the European Economic Area, Canada, Japan, Switzerland or the United States or; hold a valid residence permit issued by a Member State of the European Economic Area and Switzerland or; hold a residence permit issued by Andorra, Canada, Japan, Republic of San Marino, or the United States, that guarantees unrestricted right of return or; are a family member of a citizen of the EEA member or Switzerland or; are a flight crew may be exempt from the airport transit visa requirement.
Mexican diplomatic passport holders are exempt from visa requirements. 180 days visa free if holding a valid visa for Canada, Japan, USA, United Kingdom or a Schengen Member State
